languages.text: "Чего я не ожидала — так это того, что на планете нас будет ждать засада! Я высадилась туда с небольшим отрядом, предоставленным мне Теодорой. Я знаю житие святой Ардженты наизусть, знаю все легенды о ней. Я искала путь по туманным намекам — описанию гор и рек, упоминавшихся в сказаниях тысячелетней давности. И я была уверена, что нашла путь к кораблю! И тут на нас напали".

traits.locale_text: "Чего я не ожидала — так это того, что на планете нас будет ждать засада! Я высадилась туда с небольшим отрядом, предоставленным мне Теодорой. Я знаю житие Святой Ардженты наизусть, знаю все легенды о ней. Я искала путь по туманным намекам — описанию гор и рек, упоминавшихся в сказаниях тысячелетней давности. И я была уверена, что нашла путь к кораблю! И тут на нас напали".

languages.text: "What I didn't expect was an ambush waiting for us on the planet! I landed there with a small unit provided by Theodora. I know Saint Argenta's hagiography by heart, I know all the legends about her. I followed their obscure clues — the descriptions of mountains and rivers from millennia-old tales. And I was certain that I had found the way to the ship! And that's when we were attacked."
languages.original_text: "Чего я не ожидала — так это того, что на планете нас будет ждать засада! Я высадилась туда с небольшим отрядом, предоставленным мне Теодорой. Я знаю житие святой Ардженты наизусть, знаю все легенды о ней. Я искала путь по туманным намекам — описанию гор и рек, упоминавшихся в сказаниях тысячелетней давности. И я была уверена, что нашла путь к кораблю! И тут на нас напали".

I know Saint Argenta's hagiography by heart, I know all the legends about her. I followed their obscure clues — the descriptions of mountains and rivers from millennia-old tales. And I was certain that I had found the way to the ship! And that's when we were attacked."

I followed their obscure clues — the descriptions of mountains and rivers from millennia-old tales. And I was certain that I had found the way to the ship! And that's when we were attacked."

"What I didn't expect was an ambush waiting for us on the planet! I landed there with a small unit provided by Theodora. I know Saint Argenta's hagiography by heart, I know all the legends about her. I followed their obscure clues — the descriptions of mountains and rivers from millennia-old tales. And I was certain that I had found the way to the ship! And that's when we were attacked."

languages.text: “不过我没料到的是，我们在那颗行星上遭到了伏击！我和西奥多拉派遣的小分队在行星上登陆。我对圣阿洁塔的传记烂熟于心，我清楚所有关于她的传说。我沿着这些传说中晦涩的线索，根据几千年前的传说故事中对山川河流的描述不断前进。我相信我已经找到了通往飞船的道路！可就在那时，我们遭到了袭击。”
languages.original_text: "What I didn't expect was an ambush waiting for us on the planet! I landed there with a small unit provided by Theodora. I know Saint Argenta's hagiography by heart, I know all the legends about her. I followed their obscure clues — the descriptions of mountains and rivers from millennia-old tales. And I was certain that I had found the way to the ship! And that's when we were attacked."

traits.locale_text: “不过我没料到的是，我们在那颗行星上遭到了伏击！我和西奥多拉派遣的小分队在行星上登陆。我对圣阿洁塔的传记烂熟于心，我清楚所有关于她的传说。我沿着这些传说中晦涩的线索，根据几千年前的传说故事中对山川河流的描述不断前进。我相信我已经找到了通往飞船的道路！可就在那时，我们遭到了袭击。”

languages.text: «¡Lo que no esperaba es que nos emboscaran al llegar al planeta! Aterricé allí con una pequeña unidad que me había asignado Theodora. Me sé de memoria la hagiografía de santa Argenta y conozco todas sus leyendas. Seguí las pistas más ocultas, las descripciones de montes y ríos en historias milenarias. ¡Estaba segura de que había encontrado el camino a la nave! Y ahí es donde nos atacaron».
languages.original_text: "What I didn't expect was an ambush waiting for us on the planet! I landed there with a small unit provided by Theodora. I know Saint Argenta's hagiography by heart, I know all the legends about her. I followed their obscure clues — the descriptions of mountains and rivers from millennia-old tales. And I was certain that I had found the way to the ship! And that's when we were attacked."

traits.locale_text: «¡Lo que no esperaba es que nos emboscaran al llegar al planeta! Aterricé allí con una pequeña unidad que me había asignado Theodora. Me sé de memoria la hagiografía de santa Argenta y conozco todas sus leyendas. Seguí las pistas más ocultas, las descripciones de montes y ríos en historias milenarias. ¡Estaba segura de que había encontrado el camino a la nave! Y ahí es donde nos atacaron».

languages.text: 「予想外だったのは、惑星で奇襲が待ち受けていたことだ！私はテオドラから提供された小部隊とともに、その惑星に降り立った。聖アルジェンタの伝記は暗記しているし、彼女にまつわる伝説もすべて知っている。何千年も前の物語に登場する山や川の描写など、曖昧な手がかりを追った。そして船への道を見つけたと確信した！そしてそのとき、私たちは襲われたのだ」
languages.original_text: "What I didn't expect was an ambush waiting for us on the planet! I landed there with a small unit provided by Theodora. I know Saint Argenta's hagiography by heart, I know all the legends about her. I followed their obscure clues — the descriptions of mountains and rivers from millennia-old tales. And I was certain that I had found the way to the ship! And that's when we were attacked."

traits.locale_text: 「予想外だったのは、惑星で奇襲が待ち受けていたことだ！私はテオドラから提供された小部隊とともに、その惑星に降り立った。聖アルジェンタの伝記は暗記しているし、彼女にまつわる伝説もすべて知っている。何千年も前の物語に登場する山や川の描写など、曖昧な手がかりを追った。そして船への道を見つけたと確信した！そしてそのとき、私たちは襲われたのだ」

languages.text: "Nicht erwartet hatte ich jedoch, dass uns auf dem Planeten ein Hinterhalt erwartete! Ich landete mit einer kleinen Einheit, die Theodora zur Verfügung gestellt hatte. Ich kenne die Hagiografie der Heiligen Argenta auswendig, einschließlich sämtlicher Legenden über sie. Ich folgte ihren obskuren Hinweisen – Beschreibungen von Bergen und Flüssen aus Jahrtausende alten Geschichten. Und ich war sicher, dass ich den Weg zum Schiff gefunden hatte! Und dann wurden wir angegriffen."
languages.original_text: "What I didn't expect was an ambush waiting for us on the planet! I landed there with a small unit provided by Theodora. I know Saint Argenta's hagiography by heart, I know all the legends about her. I followed their obscure clues — the descriptions of mountains and rivers from millennia-old tales. And I was certain that I had found the way to the ship! And that's when we were attacked."

traits.locale_text: "Nicht erwartet hatte ich jedoch, dass uns auf dem Planeten ein Hinterhalt erwartete! Ich landete mit einer kleinen Einheit, die Theodora zur Ver4fügung gestellt hatte. Ich kenne die Hagiografie der Heiligen Argenta auswendig, einschließlich sämtlicher Legenden über sie. Ich folgte ihren obskuren Hinweisen – Beschreibungen von Bergen und Flüssen aus Jahrtausende alten Geschichten. Und ich war sicher, dass ich den Weg zum Schiff gefunden hatte! Und dann wurden wir angegriffen."

languages.text: « Ce que je n'avais pas prévu, cependant, c'est que nous tomberions dans une embuscade ! J'ai atterri sur la planète avec une petite unité fournie par Théodora. Je connais l'hagiographie de Sainte Argenta par cœur, j'ai lu toutes les légendes qui la concernent. J'ai suivi leurs indices obscurs, en essayant de reconnaître les montagnes et les rivières décrites dans ces récits vieux de plusieurs millénaires, et j'étais certaine d'avoir trouvé le chemin du vaisseau ! C'est alors qu'on nous a attaqués. »
languages.original_text: "What I didn't expect was an ambush waiting for us on the planet! I landed there with a small unit provided by Theodora. I know Saint Argenta's hagiography by heart, I know all the legends about her. I followed their obscure clues — the descriptions of mountains and rivers from millennia-old tales. And I was certain that I had found the way to the ship! And that's when we were attacked."

traits.locale_text: « Ce que je n'avais pas prévu, cependant, c'est que nous tomberions dans une embuscade ! J'ai atterri sur la planète avec une petite unité fournie par Théodora. Je connais l'hagiographie de Sainte Argenta par cœur, j'ai lu toutes les légendes qui la concernent. J'ai suivi leurs indices obscurs, en essayant de reconnaître les montagnes et les rivières décrites dans ces récits vieux de plusieurs millénaires, et j'étais certaine d'avoir trouvé le chemin du vaisseau ! C'est alors qu'on nous a attaqués. »

languages.text: "Öngöremediğim bir şey vardı: Gezegende bizi bir pusu bekliyordu! Theodora'nın buyruğuyla yanıma küçük bir birim alarak gezegene iniş yaptım. Azize Argenta'nın hayat hikâyesini adım gibi bilirim, hakkındaki tüm efsaneler ezberimdedir. Müphem ipuçlarını takip etmeye başladım. Binlerce yıllık hikâyelerde tasvir edilen dağları ve nehirleri izledim. Gemiye giden yolu bulduğuma da adım kadar emindim! Tam o anda saldırıya uğradık."
languages.original_text: "What I didn't expect was an ambush waiting for us on the planet! I landed there with a small unit provided by Theodora. I know Saint Argenta's hagiography by heart, I know all the legends about her. I followed their obscure clues — the descriptions of mountains and rivers from millennia-old tales. And I was certain that I had found the way to the ship! And that's when we were attacked."

Binlerce yıllık hikâyelerde tasvir edilen dağları ve nehirleri izledim. Gemiye giden yolu bulduğuma da adım kadar emindim! Tam o anda saldırıya uğradık."
